title: PMS 2.0 584 - NFL Divisional Playoffs Preview With Ian Rapoport & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys preview all four of this weekend's Divisional Playoff games and make their picks. Joining the show to chat about all the games this weekend and pertinent injury news for teams playing this weekend as well as what to look forward in the Coaching and GM searches now that the New York Giants have officially hired former Buffalo Bills Assistant GM Joe Schoen, and much more (55:14-1:24:40). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us and enjoy the playoff games this weekend. Cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
